page.title: 14BOURTON CLUBS AND ACTIVITIES
page.content: THERE ARE NOT MANY{ORGANISED {ACTIVITIES}IN BOURTON. MANY OF THE PEOPLE GO TO SURROUNDING TOWNS AND VILLAGES FOR THEIR ENTERTAINMENT. THE CHILDREN GO TO STRETTON ON DUNSMORE FOR GROUPS SUCH AS BROWNIES AND CUBS BUT BOURTON DOES HAVE ITS OWN WOMENS INSTITUTE. MANY OF THE VILLAGES MAKE THEIR OWN ENTERTAINMENT OR WATCH TELEVISION OR HAVE A QUIET DRINK WITH THEIR FRIENDS. THERE IS A WORKING MENS CLUB IN BOURTON. AT BOURTON CLUB EVERY SATURDAY NIGHT PEOPLE PLAY BINGO. EVERY SUNDAY NIGHT THERE IS A RAFFLE AND A ROCK BAND. EVERY HALF YEAR THERE IS AN OUTING. THERE IS A DRAMA CLUB. EVERY MONTH, IN SEASON, THERE IS A CRICKET OR FOOTBALL GAME ON THE SPORTS FIELD.
